name: English Composition 101
description: Intro writing rubric focusing on clarity, structure, evidence, and mechanics.

criteria.name: Thesis & Focus
criteria.description: Clarity and specificity of the main argument; sustained focus throughout.

criteria.name: Organization & Coherence
criteria.description: Logical structure, paragraph unity, and transitions.

performance_levels.descriptor: Logical, coherent structure with strong transitions.

criteria.name: Evidence & Analysis
criteria.description: Use of evidence, integration of sources, and depth of analysis.

performance_levels.descriptor: Compelling evidence and strong analysis; sources integrated well.

criteria.name: Style & Mechanics
criteria.description: Grammar, syntax, tone, and sentence variety appropriate for an academic audience.
